title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
**Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - Revolutionizing Nighttime Fun**

Take your flying disc game to new heights with the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate nighttime flying disc experience. This professional-grade disc is designed for ultimate frisbee enthusiasts, freestyle tricksters, and anyone looking to elevate their outdoor games.

**Eye-Catching LEDs**

The TOSY Flying Disc features an astonishing 36 LEDs that shine 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market. With 16 million color RGB options, you can customize your disc to match your unique style. The LEDs are strategically placed to provide maximum visibility and an mesmerizing light show.

**Smart Modes and Motion Sensors**

This disc is equipped with advanced smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up when you're ready to play. The motion sensors ensure that the LEDs turn on and off seamlessly, conserving battery life when not in use.

**Rechargeable and Long-Lasting**

The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable via a USB Type-C to C cable (included) and takes only 30 minutes to fully charge. Enjoy up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of continuous playtime on a single charge.

**Professional-Grade Performance**

Weighing in at 175 grams, this disc meets professional ultimate standards and is designed for long, straight, and precise flights. The comfortable grip and aerodynamic design make it perfect for freestyle tricks and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

**Durable and Waterproof**

Built to last, the TOSY Flying Disc is highly durable and waterproof, ensuring that it can withstand even the toughest outdoor conditions.

**What's Included**

* 1x TOSY Flying Disc
* 1x USB Type-C to C cable (charger not included)

**Order now and experience the thrill of flying disc play like never before!**

This intelligent disc comes equipped with advanced smart modes, including brightness level control, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up the LEDs when the disc is in motion. Experience the thrill of playing with a disc that responds to your every move.

The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable via a USB Type C to C cable (included) and takes only 30 minutes to charge. With a play time of up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of continuous play, you can enjoy uninterrupted fun without worrying about running out of power.

Designed to meet professional ultimate standards, this disc weighs just 175 grams and features a comfortable grip, making it easy to throw and catch. Its aerodynamic design ensures long, straight, and precise flights, while its durable construction withstands rough play and harsh weather conditions.

**Ideal for Various Play Styles**

Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting out, the TOSY Flying Disc is perfect for:

* Nighttime play: Illuminate the sky with its dazzling LED display
* Freestyle tricks: Showcase your skills with the disc's high-visibility LEDs
* Disc games: Play popular games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes with friends and family

**Order Your TOSY Flying Disc Today!**

Experience the thrill of flying disc play like never before. Order your TOSY Flying Disc now and discover a new level of fun and excitement!
